Navigation

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UCommandlet
  • UResavePackagesCommandlet
  • UFixupNeedsLoadForEditorGameCommandlet

References

   
Module UnrealEd
Header /Engine/Source/Editor/UnrealEd/Classes/Commandlets/ResavePackagesCommandlet.h
Include #include "Commandlets/ResavePackagesCommandlet.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI)  
class UResavePackagesCommandlet : public UCommandlet

Remarks

Added to expose this to the save packages test

Variables

  Type Name Description
bool bAutoCheckIn If we should auto checkin packages that were checked out
bool bAutoCheckOut If we should auto checkout packages that need to be saved
bool bBatchSourceControl If we should batch together source control operations rather than submit them one at a time
bool bCanIgnoreFails Skip the assert when a package can not be opened
bool bForceClusterGeneration  
bool bForceProxyGeneration  
bool bForceSingleClusterForLevel  
bool bForceUATEnvironmentVariableSet  
bool bGenerateClusters  
bool bGenerateMeshProxies  
bool bHLODMapCleanup  
bool bIgnoreChangelist Ignore package version changelist
bool bOnlyLicenseed Only save packages that been saved by a licensee
bool bOnlyMaterials Only process packages containing materials
bool bOnlyPayloadTrailers Only save packages containing FPayloadTrailers
bool bOnlySaveDirtyPackages If we should only save dirty packages
bool bOnlyUnversioned Only save packages with a changelist of zero
bool bOnlyVirtualized Only save packages containing bulkdata payloads that have been virtualized
bool bResaveOnDemand  
bool bShouldBuildHLOD Should we update HLODs
bool bShouldBuildLighting Should we build lighting for the packages we are saving?
bool bShouldBuildNavigationData Should we build navigation data for the packages we are saving?
bool bShouldBuildReflectionCaptures Should we build reflection captures for the packages we are saving?
bool bShouldBuildTextureStreaming Should we build texture streaming for the packages we are saving?
bool bShouldBuildTextureStreamingForAll Similar to above, but applies to all packages rather than just maps
bool bSkipCheckedOutFiles If we should simply skip checked out files rather than error-ing out
bool bSkipPayloadTrailers Only save packages without a FPayloadTrailer
bool bSkipSubLevels  
bool bSkipVirtualization If we should skip trying to virtualize packages being checked in
bool bSkipVirtualized Only save packages containing bulkdata payloads that have not been virtualized
bool bStripEditorOnlyContent Strip editor only content
bool bVerifyContent Load all packages, and display warnings for those packages which would have been resaved but were read-only
TSet< FName > CollectionFilter Filter packages based on a collection
TArray< FString > FilesToSubmit List of files to submit
FString ForceHLODSetupAsset  
int32 GarbageCollectionFrequency Only collect garbage after N packages
FString HLODSkipToMap  
ELightingBuildQuality LightingBuildQuality Lighting Build Quality(default: Production)
int32 MaxPackagesToResave Maximum number of packages to resave to avoid having a massive sync A value of -1 (default) removes this limitation.
int32 MaxResaveLicenseeUEVersion Limits resaving to packages with this licensee package version or lower.
int32 MaxResaveUEVersion Limits resaving to packages with this UE4 package version or lower.
int32 MinResaveUEVersion Only packages that have this version or higher will be resaved; a value of IGNORE_PACKAGE_VERSION indicates that there is no minimum package version
int32 PackagesConsideredForResave Running count of packages that got modified and will need to be resaved
int32 PackagesDeleted  
int32 PackagesResaved  
FString PackageSubstring If non-empty, this substring has to be present in the package name for the commandlet to process it.
TArray< FString > RedirectorsToFixup List of redirector packages that should be fixed up at the end
TArray< FString > ResaveClasses Allows users to save only packages with a particular class in them (useful for fixing content)
TSet< FName > ResaveOnDemandPackages If running resaveondemand, only packages reported into this set are resaved.
FCriticalSection ResaveOnDemandPackagesLock  
TSet< FName > ResaveOnDemandSystems  
TPimplPtr< class FQueuedSourceControlOperations > SourceControlQueue A queue containing source control operations to be performed in batches.
TArray< FString > Switches The list of switches that were passed on the commandline
int32 TotalPackagesForResave  
EBrevity Verbosity
